snippet: The accused were convicted on charges including intentional murder, arson and participating in terrorist activities, with nine people sentenced to death. Three others received
abstract: Chinese courts in northwestern region of Xinjiang sentence 81 people on terrorism and other charges, part of widening crackdown after spate of deadly violence in country for which authorities blame foreign-backed Islamist separatists.
lead_paragraph: The accused were convicted on charges including intentional murder, arson and participating in terrorist activities, with nine people sentenced to death. Three others received

headline.main: China Sentences Scores in Xinjiang for Acts of Terror
headline.print_headline: China Sentences Scores in Xinjiang for Acts of Terror
